about_the_game:
The quintessential castle tileset for JRPGs! If you're designing a classic old-school RPG and need a special fortress for your royal family or even your villain, take a look at this. Includes all the basics, plus lots of animations!

This castle tileset includes:

Ground tiles:

* grass and dirt tiles
* water, blood water and poison water
* lava
* 4 types of stone paths
* 3 red rugs
* two wood paths
* spike traps
* 2 pits
* stone fence
* ground covers, random stones and wall cracks
* 2 tables
* battlements

Wall Tiles:

* two brick patterns (one with notch detail)
* plain stone wall
* roof tiles - plain stone, red and black

Also Includes:

* staircases (vertical and horizontal, some with matching rugs)
* treasure chest
* heraldry symbols
* flags and wall tapestry
* torches
* prison with beds, skeletons and more
* cracks, dirt and holes
* kitchen and kitchen supplies (barrels, wine bottles, cookware, etc)
* armory supplies with axes, swords and armor
* thrones
* beds and other common furniture
* windows (lit and unlit, plus angled versions)
* rounded pillars and towers, with custom roofs
* angled walls
* doors and arches
* a gargoyle
* trees
* and more!

Events and Animations:

* Levers, fancy door, plain door, cell door, various flames, and treasure chest!

*** This pack features the non-snow covered version of KR Snow Castle Tileset and also shares the identical "Castle B" tilesheet ***

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
